statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT image_name, time_taken FROM satellite_images WHERE erosion_level > 3;
SELECT image_id FROM satellite_images WHERE erosion_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY time_taken DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE location_name = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY time_taken ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM satellite_images;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE location_name = 'Mount Everest' ORDER BY time_taken DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, location_name FROM satellite_images WHERE erosion_level > 5 ORDER BY time_taken ASC;
SELECT image_name, location_name, erosion_level FROM satellite_images WHERE time_taken >= '2022-01-01' AND time_taken <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE location_name LIKE '%City%' AND erosion_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY time_taken DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(erosion_level), MIN(erosion_level), MAX(erosion_level) FROM satellite_images WHERE time_taken >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM satellite_images ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion WHERE erosion_extent > 0.5;
SELECT image_id, ST_AsText(erosion_area) FROM coastal_erosion WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(erosion_extent) AS avg_extent FROM coastal_erosion;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT erosion_id, erosion_area FROM coastal_erosion WHERE erosion_extent > 0.5 ORDER BY erosion_extent ASC;
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM satellite_images WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion WHERE ST_DWithin(erosion_area, 'POINT(50.0 30.0)', 10.0);
SELECT AVG(erosion_extent) AS avg_extent FROM coastal_erosion GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_extent DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_timestamp, location FROM satellite_images;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, image_timestamp, erosion_level FROM satellite_images WHERE erosion_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM erosion_impact WHERE impact_level < 0.3 ORDER BY impact_id;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, location, impact_description FROM human_activities JOIN erosion_impact ON human_activities.impact_id = erosion_impact.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, location, erosion_level FROM satellite_images WHERE erosion_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM erosion_impact ORDER BY impact_level DESC;
SELECT i.image_id, i.image_timestamp, e.erosion_type, e.impact_level FROM satellite_images i JOIN erosion_impact e ON i.image_id = e.image_id;

SELECT h.activity_id, h.activity_type, h.activity_date, e.impact_type, e.impact_description FROM human_activities h JOIN erosion_impact e ON h.impact_id = e.impact_id WHERE h.activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, image_timestamp FROM satellite_images WHERE image_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, erosion_level FROM erosion_assessment WHERE erosion_level > 2;
SELECT area_name, erosion_impact FROM coastal_areas WHERE erosion_impact BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, erosion_level FROM erosion_assessment WHERE erosion_level > 2 AND confidence_score > 0.7
SELECT * FROM human_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY activity_date ASC
SELECT area_name, erosion_impact FROM coastal_areas WHERE erosion_impact IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_resolution FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution='High';
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM erosion_areas WHERE area_size > 1000 ORDER BY area_size ASC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM coastal_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM comparison_results WHERE erosion_change < 0.5 ORDER BY erosion_change DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images
SELECT * FROM erosion_areas WHERE erosion_rate > 5.0
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_impact FROM coastal_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT area_name, area_location, area_size FROM erosion_areas WHERE area_size < 1000
SELECT * FROM comparison_results WHERE erosion_change BETWEEN -5.0 AND 5.0
